translation: v.打呵欠；张开n.呵欠；乏味的人（事）
examples: (1) His long boring story made me yawn.(2) He closed the book, yawned, and went to bed.(3) The deep crevasse yawned at their feet.(4) I gave a loud yawn, but he just kept on talking.(5) He stretched himself with a yawn.
(1) 他的冗长的故事听得我直打呵欠。(2) 他合起书, 打了个呵欠, 然后上床睡觉了。(3) 他们脚下的冰川有一道深深的裂缝。(4) 我大声打了个呵欠，可他还是不停地讲下去。(5) 他打了个呵欠伸了伸懒腰。
(1) Don't yell at me!(2) You don't have to yell; I can hear you.(3) She yelled out at her mischievous child.(4) We yelled our good-byes as the bus left.(5) She let out a yell and ran home.
(1) 别对我大喊大叫！(2) 你用不著喊，我听得见。(3) 她对她淘气的孩子大喊大叫。(4) 汽车离开时我们大喊再见。(5) 她尖叫了一声跑回了家。
(1) I like drinking creamy yoghurt in summer.(2) Drink yoghurt to have curative effect to the cold?(3) This yoghurt contains no artificial flavouring or colouring.
(1) 我喜欢在夏天喝些酸奶。(2) 喝酸奶对感冒有疗效吗？(3) 这种酸乳酪不含人造香料或著色剂。

(1) In his youth, he had shown great promise.(2) He mused over memories of his youth.(3) Youth glided past without our awareness.(4) I can't bear young people casting away their youth.(5) The youth of the country are being ignored by politicians.(6) His brother is a member of a youth fellowship.
(1) 他在青少年时代就显得很有出息。(2) 他重温青年时期的往事。(3) 青春在我们不知不觉中逝去。(4) 我无法忍受年轻人虚掷青春。(5) 这个国家的青年没有受到政治家的重视。(6) 他哥哥是青年联谊会的会员。

translation: adj.美味的；好吃的；愉快的；吸引人的，悦人的
examples: (1) This cake is really yummy.(2) Chocolate cake for tea? How yummy!(3) I could eat a whole pot of that hot, yummy carrot.
(1) 蛋糕非常美味。(2) 有巧克力蛋糕当茶点? 多好吃啊！(3) 我可以吃一锅那样的又热又好吃的胡萝卜。

translation: n. 院子；码（英制中丈量长度单位，1码=3英尺）；庭院；帆桁vt. 把…关进或围在畜栏里n. (Yard)人名；(英)亚德
examples: I was out in the back yard splitting logs.We planted some elms in the yard.Her carriage was the most beautiful one in the yard.He parked his car in the yard.His quiet home sits back in his yard.The trees formed a canopy over the yard.Three feet make one yard.Cloth is sold by the yard.
我那时正在后院劈柴。我们在院子里种了一些榆树。她的马车是院子里最漂亮的。他把车停在院子里。他那幽静家座落在庭院里端。树木覆盖著庭院。三英尺为一码。布是按码卖的。

translation: n. 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
examples: Winter is the coldest season in a year.The thief was put into prison for one year.She was designated sportswoman of the year.She is sixteen years old but has a mental age of five.Mary will proceed to the degree of M.A. this year.
冬季是一年中最冷的季节。小偷被监禁一年。她被指定为本年度的体坛明星。她十六岁，而智力年龄是五岁。玛丽本学年将继续攻读硕士学位。

translation: adj. 黄色的；黄皮肤的adj. 胆小的n. 黄色；黄种人；黄色颜料vi. 变黄或发黄vt. 使变黄或发黄
examples: The leaves turn yellow in autumn.The leaves of the book had yellowed with age.She wore on her head a yellow kerchief.Sunflowers are large flowers with yellow petals.Yellow is the prevailing color in her room.The yolk is the yellow part in an egg.The pages of the book began to yellow.The leaves of the trees begin to yellow in September.
秋天时叶子变黄。书页因年久而变黄。她头上带着一块黄色的头巾。向日葵是长着黄色花瓣的大花。黄色是她房间的主色。蛋黄是鸡蛋中的黄色部分。书页开始发黄了。树叶在九月开始变黄。

translation: adv. 是, 是的n. 是（表示肯定）
examples: Yes, monsieur.Yes, you're quite right.Yes, I don't see why not.Yes, it's still in my mind.Yes, perhaps I'm wrong there.Answer yes or no.Did he give a yes or a no to your idea?Answer with a plain "yes" if you agree with me.The boy kept yessing when his father was talking with him.
是，先生。是的，你很对。是的，我看不出有什么不好。是的，这事仍在我的记忆里。是的，在这点上也许我错了。回答是或者不是。他对你的想法表示赞成还是反对?如果你同意我的意见，就明白地回答“是”。那个男孩在他爸爸对他说话时连声说是。

translation: n. 昨天；往昔adv. 昨天
examples: Yesterday was Friday.I saw him only yesterday.She had an attack of indigestion yesterday.
昨天是星期五。我昨天才见到他。她昨天消化不良。

translation: adv. 还；但是；已经conj. 但是；然而n. (Yet)人名；(东南亚国家华语)一
examples: He hasn't done much yet."It's time to go." "I'm not ready yet."Have you composed your masterpiece yet? Have we seen it?Edwina nodded, not ready yet to speak.It was a rash thing to do, yet one cannot but admire her courage.She trained hard all year yet still failed to reach her best form.Great progress has been made, yet much still remains to be done.
他做的还不很多。出路对你来说,你是否已经完成了你的杰作了呢?我们什么时候能见到它?埃德温娜点点头,仍然呆呆地说不出话来。这事做得过于鲁莽她全年艰苦训练,然而仍未达到自己的最佳状态。已经取得了很大进步,但是仍有许多事情有待去做。

translation: pron. 你；你们n. (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷
examples: Do you speak English?I shall await you at seven-thirty or thereabouts.You must all listen carefully.Do you have a room available?Nobody wants to help you in this town.
你会说英语吗？我将在7点30分左右等着你。你们都必须仔细听着。你们有空房间吗？在这座小城市里没有人愿意帮助别人。

translation: adj. 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的n. 年轻人；（动物的）崽，仔n. (Young)人名；(中)杨(广东话·威妥玛)；(柬)永；(英、葡)扬
examples: The young look is in fashion this year.Those clothes she's wearing are much too young for her.The evening is still young.He was young in this kind of work.The young in our society need care and protection.This is a book for young and old alike.The bird went back to the nest to feed her young.
今年时兴扮年轻人的样子。她穿的那些衣服显得太年轻了。晚间刚开始不久。他对这种工作经验不多。我们社会的年轻人需要关怀和照顾。这本书老少咸宜。那只鸟飞回巢去喂幼鸟了。
Your work falls short of my expectations.Please advise us of any change in your plan.
你的工作未达到我的期望。你们的计划倘有变更,请告诉我们。

translation: pron. 你（们）的东西；你的责任[义务]；你的家属；来信，尊函adj. 你（们）的（东西）；信末署名前用语
examples: My feelings are in unison with yours.His problem is similar to yours.We must fit our plan in with yours.His bicycle is of better quality than yours.
我的感情与你的感情是一致的。他的问题和你的相似。我们必须使我们的计划与你们的协调一致。他的自行车质量比你们的好。

Forget yourself and think of someone else for a change.Please make yourself at home.You've only yourself to blame.Please don't blame yourself.I believe that you can work out this problem by yourself.You and your sister said so yourselves.
别光想著你自己，你也为别人想一次。请别客气。你只能怪你自己。请不要责怪你自己。我相信你自己能做出这道题的。你和你姐姐都这么说。

translation: pron. 你们自己；你们本人（yourself的复数）
examples: Take care not to hurt yourselves.You must find yourselves some chairs for the meeting.The appreciation must come from yourselves.No one can cheat you out of ultimate success but yourselves.
当心不要伤了你们自己。你们要给你们自己找些椅子开会用。欣赏必须发自你自己。除了你自己，没有人能骗你远离最后的成功。
